#BlackMagicCraft #Episode155 #FAILURE

Is an experiment that goes bad actually a success? In some ways I think it is. I set out to create a new technique for making quick ruins for Frostgrave and ended up trying something that didn't really work. But I tried it and now I know. That is a success in it's own way.

title: FAILURE...is an experiment gone wrong a SUCCESS?
